title: Markets, Investing, And The Future Of NYC's Economy
itunes:title: Markets, Investing, And The Future Of NYC's Economy
description:
Brad Lander, Member of the New York City Council and candidate for Comptroller, discusses the future of New York City's economy. Michael Sonnenfeldt, Founder & Chairman of Tiger 21, discusses how the ultra-wealthy are investing right now. Lisa Shalett, Chief Investment Officer at Morgan Stanley Wealth Management, talks markets and investing. Jay Hatfield, Founder & CEO of Infrastructure Capital Advisors, discusses the markets and latest infrastructure themes. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
